description: Design a REST API for an e-commerce platform. The API manages three resources: Users (id, email, name, shipping address), Products (id, name, description, price, category, stock_count), and Orders (id, user_id, items array with product_id/quantity/unit_price, total, status enum: pending/confirmed/shipped/delivered/cancelled, created_at). The API requires JWT bearer authentication. List endpoints should support pagination. The API should be production-ready.
